lookup

public Service lookup(Class serviceClass)
Searches for an instance of the specified Service within the Registry

Parameters:
serviceClass - Class of the Service that needs to be looked up
Returns:
an instance of the Service registered with the Registry. It returns a null value if the Service is not found
